Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class ShipmentsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.ShipmentsController
@Controller public class ShipmentsController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with shipments.
Since:
2/8/2022
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu, Fady Aziz faa1002@sru.edu

  • Constructor Details

    • ShipmentsController

      public ShipmentsController(BidsRepository bidsRepository, ShipmentsRepository shipmentsRepository, CarriersRepository carriersRepository, VehiclesRepository vehiclesRepository)
      Constructor for ShipmentsController.
      Instantiates the shipmentsRepository
      Instantiates the carriersRepository
      Instantiates the vehiclesRepository
      Instantiates the bidsRepository
      Parameters:
      shipmentsRepository - Used to interact with the shipments in the database
      carriersRepository - Used to interact with the carriers in the database
      vehiclesRepository - Used to interact with the vehicles in the database
      bidsRepository - Used to interact with the bids in the database

    • showList

      @GetMapping("/add-shipments") public String showList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Shipments shipment, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-shipments page
      Adds carriers and vehicles to the model.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      shipment - Information on the shipment being added
      result - Ensures that the values entered by the user are valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-shipments"

    • addShipment

      @RequestMapping("/addshipments") public String addShipment(@Validated Shipments shipment, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a shipment to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      Sets carrier, vehicle to null, paid amount and scac are empty strings and full freight terms is set to AVAILABLE SHIPMENT.
      Currently logged in user is also associated with that shipment.
      If there are no errors, the shipment is saved in the shipmentsRepository. and the user is redirect to /createdshipments
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-shipments page.
      Parameters:
      shipment - Stores the information on the shipment being added
      result - Ensures that the values entered by the user are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/createdshipments" or "/add/add-shipments"

    • deleteShipment

      @GetMapping("/deleteshipment/{id}") public String deleteShipment(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, redirects to confirmation page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/shipments"

    • deleteShipmentConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deleteshipmentconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteShipmentConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, deletes the shipment and redirects to shipments page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/createdshipments"

    • viewCarrierShipments

      @GetMapping("/viewshipment/{id}") public String viewCarrierShipments(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a carrier using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the shipments of that carrier to the shipments page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being viewed
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "shipments"

    • viewShipmentBids

      @GetMapping("/viewshipmentbids/{id}") public String viewShipmentBids(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, adds all of the bids of that shipment to the bids page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being used to get the bids
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "shipments"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editshipment/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a shipment using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that shipment to a form and redirects the user to that update form.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-location"

    • updateShipment

      @PostMapping("/updateshipment/{id}") public String updateShipment(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Shipments shipment, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a shipment to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the shipment is updated in the shipmentsRepository. and the user is redirect to /shipments
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-shipments page.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the shipment being updated
      shipment - Information on the shipment being updated
      result - Ensures that the values entered by the user are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/shipments" or "/update/update-shipments"

    • ListFromExcelData

      @GetMapping("/uploadshipments") public String ListFromExcelData(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Uploads an excel file containing shipments
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/uploadshipments"

    • LoadFromExcelData

      @PostMapping("/upload-shipment") public String LoadFromExcelData(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile excelData)
      Reads an excel file containing shipments and adds it to the shipments repository.
      After the file is uploaded and added to the database, user is redirected to the created shipments page
      Parameters:
      excelData - Excel file that is being added to the database
      Returns:
      "redirect:/createdshipments"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
